abstract: Top Christie's executives Paul R Provost, Nicholas Hall and Cathy Elkies leave auction house for unspecified reasons.
snippet: Paul R. Provost, Nicholas Hall and Cathy Elkies are no longer at the company, which didn’t say whether they were dismissed or left on their own accord....
lead_paragraph: Paul R. Provost, Nicholas Hall and Cathy Elkies are no longer at the company, which didn’t say whether they were dismissed or left on their own accord.
